name: The Dark Maze - alpha
description:
"The Dark Maze" is a puzzle-maze game that including two modes to play; normal and survival. In normal mode will try to reach the portal before timer reach zero. In survival mode you will need to collect all beets before caught by monsters to go next level. Including a cooperative mode to collect beets with your friends in survival mode. Gamepad, LAN and internet options will be available in cooperative mode.

---
Note: This the alpha stage of the game. Maybe you can meet with some problems, still in development. Help us to make it better!

Which things will be added in the future;
• More levels
• More types of walls - backgrounds
• More enemies
• New musics
• LAN and internet options for the coop mode
• And much more...
